def_cn: 使（通常指不好的事件或形势）突然发生；加速
def_en: If something precipitates an event or situation, usually a bad one, it causes it to happen suddenly or sooner than normal.

def_cn: （行动或决定）仓猝的，贸然的，突然的
def_en: A precipitate action or decision happens or is made more quickly or suddenly than most people think is sensible.
